definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: Buy a pedometer at a sporting goods store.
sentences.chinese: 買一個計步器一家體育用品商店。

sentences.english: The volunteers also wore pedometers to count their steps.
sentences.chinese: 受試者同時也佩戴計步器來計算步數。

sentences.english: But just adding steps on your pedometer doesn't count.
sentences.chinese: 但是僅僅在你計步器上增加步數是不算的。

sentences.english: Or wear a pedometer and keep track of your steps.
sentences.chinese: 或者，戴上計步器記錄你的步數，也是不錯的選擇。

sentences.english: People who wear a pedometer walk 27% more than those who don't!
sentences.chinese: 有計步器的人要比沒有的人多走27%的路。

sentences.english: When you are ready, note the number on the pedometer.
sentences.chinese: 準備好以後，記下計步器上的數字。

sentences.english: Wearing a pedometer that measures distance can encourage more walking.
sentences.chinese: 戴上能計算距離的計步器有助於走更多的路。

sentences.english: Buy a pedometer, and walk more.

definition: to monitor/to keep an eye on
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 ding4 wei4 xi4 tong3
